text: Metropolitan Vladimir (Volodymyr; secular name Viktor Markianovich Sabodan, , , November 23, 1935-5 July, 2014) was a Ukrainian religious leader. He was the head of the Ukrainian Orthodox Church (Moscow Patriarchate) (UOC-MP) 1992-2014. He died on July 5, 2014 from internal bleeding at the age of 78.Metropolitan Volodymyr dies. Ukrayinska Pravda. July 5, 2014 ==References== ==Other websites== * Metropolitan Volodymyr Category:1935 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Ukrainian Christian clergy Category:Eastern Orthodox bishops
title: Volodymyr Sabodan
